DOC.HEADLINE: 19 IRAN CITIES FLOODED
DOC.TEXT: Torrential rains in Iran caused flooding_in 19 cities and 700 villages when rivers overflowed and bridges washed_away , Tehran radio reported . The radio quoted an unidentified official as saying that 10 # 000 homes and shops or offices were damaged , along with 2 # 470 acres of agricultural land . He said damage was estimated at $ 171.4 million .
